articles.description: Jermaine Marrow scored 23 points, Malique Trent-Street added 20 with four 3-pointers in the second half and Hampton beat Coppin State 82-79 on Monday night.
articles.headline: Hampton grinds out 82-79 win over Coppin State

articles.description: Charles Williams scored 28 points on Monday night, RJ Cole had 18 points, nine rebounds, six assists and two steals and Howard used three big first-half runs to pull away for an 84-56 win over Maryland-Eastern Shore.
articles.headline: Howard cruises to 84-56 win over Maryland-Eastern Shore

articles.description: Brandon Tabb scored 25 points with four steals, Isaiah Bailey added 22 points and eight assists and Bethune-Cookman beat North Carolina Central 99-81 on Monday night.
articles.headline: Bethune-Cookman coasts to 99-81 win over NC Central

articles.description: Kimbal Mackenzie scored six of his 11 points in the final 21 seconds, including the winning 3-pointer as time expired, to help Bucknell rally for a 65-64 win over Colgate on Monday night.
articles.headline: Mackenzie 3s caps late spurt, lifts Bucknell over Colgate

images.caption: The Bison trailed by 10 points with under 50 seconds to go, but chip away at Colgate's lead before Kimbal Mackenzie hits the 3-pointer at the horn to win it.
images.name: Bucknell caps off comeback with buzzer-beater

articles.description: Evan Fisher had 10 of his 21 points in overtime, including two free throws with 12.4 seconds left, to help Siena beat Iona 82-78 on Monday night.
articles.headline: Fisher's 10 points in OT help Siena get past Iona 82-78

articles.description: Joel Berry II drops 21 points and Theo Pinson puts up 16 of his own to lead No. 14 North Carolina to a 83-66 win over injury-plagued Notre Dame.
articles.headline: UNC comes away with home victory

images.caption: Joel Berry II drops 21 points and Theo Pinson puts up 16 of his own to lead No. 14 North Carolina to a 83-66 win over injury-plagued Notre Dame.
images.name: UNC comes away with home victory

videos.description: The Tigers hold the Razorbacks to 33 percent shooting from the floor to move to 2-1 in conference play.
videos.headline: LSU defeats Arkansas 75-54
